courseDetails.title: Accordion For Beginners: Learn, Practice & Play Songs By Ear
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn To Play Accordion As A Beginner While Teaching Yourself How To Play Songs On The Piano Accordion & The Bass Notes
targetAudiences: Beginners Who Tried To Learn Accordion Before, But Thought That It Was Too DIFFICULT & COMPLICATED!
A Person That Has Played Accordion Before and Has An Idea Of The Basics, But Wants To Improve By Learning How To Play WITH A PROFESSIONAL WAY!
Someone That Wants To Play For Fun Some Songs And Needs A Point To Start!
An OLD Accordionist That Wants To Get Back To This Instrument After A Long Brake!
